casebody.data:
State
v.
Anthony Leon Hoover 370P04-16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 Elizabeth N. Strickland, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Anthony Leon Hoover, for Hoover, Anthony Leon. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of November 2016 by Defendant for Mandamus Mandate Mandatory Injunction Appeal: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017." Hudson, J. recused
